param.name: keyComparer
param.span: The key comparer to use for the dictionary.

span.span: The key comparer to use for the dictionary.

param.name: valueComparer
param.span: The value comparer to use for the dictionary.

span.span: The value comparer to use for the dictionary.

summary.span: Enumerates and transforms a sequence, and produces an immutable sorted dictionary of its contents by using the specified key and value comparers.

span.span: Enumerates and transforms a sequence, and produces an immutable sorted dictionary of its contents by using the specified key and value comparers.

returns.span: An immutable sorted dictionary that contains the items in the specified sequence.

span.span: An immutable sorted dictionary that contains the items in the specified sequence.
